jrtr

Class GLVertexArrayObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • jrtr.GLVertexArrayObject

  • public class GLVertexArrayObject
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility class to encapsulate an OpenGL "vertex array object" (VAO).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl 
      private java.nio.IntBuffer vao 
      private java.nio.IntBuffer vbo 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GLVertexArrayObject(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl, int numberOfVBOs)
      Make an OpenGL "vertex array object" (VAO) with a desired number of "vertex buffer objects" (VBOs).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void bind()
      Bind the VAO.
      int getNextVBO()
      Get reference to next VBO stored in the IntBuffer.
      void rewindVBO()
      Rewind the IntBuffer storing the references to the VBOs.

    • Field Detail

      • gl

    • Constructor Detail

      • GLVertexArrayObject

        public GLVertexArrayObject(javax.media.opengl.GL3 gl,
                   int numberOfVBOs)
        Make an OpenGL "vertex array object" (VAO) with a desired number of "vertex buffer objects" (VBOs). Each VBO refers to a buffer with one vertex attribute, like vertex positions, normals, or texture coordinates.
        Parameters:
        gl - the OpenGL rendering context to store the VAO
        numberOfVBOs - the number of VBOs to be stored in the VAO

    • Method Detail

      • rewindVBO

        public void rewindVBO()
        Rewind the IntBuffer storing the references to the VBOs.

      • getNextVBO

        public int getNextVBO()
        Get reference to next VBO stored in the IntBuffer.

      • bind

        public void bind()
        Bind the VAO. This means all the information associated with the VAO becomes active in OpenGL.
